title: "Schoolgirl Vel'Koz is Wrong for Every Reason"
body: When I read that... I JUST LOL (it's under the rules on the left)

replies.body:
OH COME ON

Velk'Koz is all about learning... and that's what schoolgirls do >.>
"Thank you for your cooperation... not that i wanted it, B-Baka""
Tsundere Vel'Koz FTW XD
A POSSIBLE LOOPHOLE?!
A loophole is just another hole for vel'koz to penetrate...... because he has tentacles

Internet, I am disappointed in you. 

I Googled Schoolgirl Vel'Koz and found zero pieces of art depicting Vel'Koz in a schoolgirl outfit. I did, however, see some awesome Professor Vel'Koz stuff. :3
Piece of advice:  You REALLY REALLY should not go around googling things suggested by many of the people on these forums.
Safe Search is pretty much my BFF. :D
Be sure to always practice Safe Search, lads and gents.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TMvxPr0B,comment-id=000b00010000,timestamp=2015-04-06T19:40:05.763+0000)
>
> Safe Search is pretty much my BFF. :D

But then you miss all the juicy bits...

What are you talking about? The Interwebs are full of nothing but people who have my best interests at heart. 

Now if you'll excuse me, my friends told me about this wonderful website called 4chan...
Who is this 4chan?

I looked it up. What the hell does Google think Yorick is? 

O_O is Yorick a woman?
you did the thing, you shouldn't've done the thing...
Zhu Li would have done the thing.

are you Zhu Li? No? I thought not.

Zhu Li! get this ruffian out of here! And where are my slippers?
-Grabs pen and paper- Don't worry mylady, I'm here to save the day!
ok, let's try.

so we deny vel'koz the right to be a girl and visit a school
very intolerant, deeply problematic (:
I imagine everyone here has seen enough, ahem, *anime* to know where such a skin would be going.
Yeah, anime, hahaha...
I ... uh... don't have a clue what you're talking about... XD

I was actually referring to Magical Girl anime, not ~~tentacle h3nt41.~~ Get your minds out of the gutter, people.

{{champion:161}}: "Light that banishes shadow and reveals truth, shine down and give me strength! In the name of the Void, I will punish you! Now take this! My love, my pain and all of my knowledge, for mine is a laser that will pierce the heavens! Life Form Disintegration Ray, go!"

Magical Girl Vel'Koz is a whole 'nother level of awesome. We gotta make a series now.

something like:

Magical Girl Schoolgirl Vel'Koz Geometry Savior of the Universe

Episode 1: Headmistress Fiora demands discipline!
More like *Headmistress Fiona demands to be disciplined*
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/supa-hot-fire.gif
This guy deserves a medal.

I just got back from an Anime convention, read this at work, and nearly died laughing. Thank you mate, I needed a laugh this Monday. XD

I don't know what you mean.  I just figure a being that exists to gain knowledge should have a school-related outfit, much like Fiora does.  (And Fiora's doesn't even make sense thematically!)  Since there is no universally recognized male school outfit, only a schoolgirl makes sense for Vel'koz.
http://i.imgur.com/FLweRkn.jpg

You do know that if they had a skin like this it could cause..well...player issues? It could imply something a bit too dark for this game, its the same reason Battle Bunny Rengar isn't a thing yet. _**YET**_

Yeah, i'm aware but its not that i'm talking about, School Girl Vel'Koz is obviously going to be pulled into one of those whole "OMFG TENTACLE R--- JOKE THATS WRONG RITO" scenarios and really don't want to see people endlessly bitching like they already do although the skin idea would be hilarious.

Edit: Why's lulu on there?

Battlebunny Riven
Headmistress Fiora
Armor of the Fifth Ages Taric
Heartseeker Varus
Popstar Ahri
DJ Sona ('s booty)
Police officer Vi/Caitlyn

Why can't the void have pretty (and controversial) skins too! D:

I saw the ('s booty) and just started giggling uncontrollably, and as a response:
BBR:Eh, this one goes two ways, I view it as somewhat not as dark as a SG Vel'Koz but it seems like more of a fanservice skin
HF: I don't see what offensive in this one or implying something dark
AFAT: Okay, i'll admit this ones gotta be implying a certain sexuality.
HSV: Urgh, fanservice.
PA: FANSERVICE STAHP
DJ: I don't know, that booty does imply alot.
PO Vi/Cait: ?

As a better way of explaining the crap job I did trying to put my thoughts into words, I do know there are some skins in the game that might be implying something a bit deeper (you forgot Kitty Cat Katarina (MEOW)) but I feel a SK Vel'Koz would be implying a tentacle r--- joke and compared to the other skins I don't find the little skins just based on making a certain champion more visually appealing that bad or as horrible as a joke like that. (PA, HV) Also, I know it would just be a silly skin for the giggles but obviously Rito doesn't want to deal with the endless sea of hate from people that think its wrong or actually implying tentacle r---.

As an example:
Heartseeker Varus was a valentines day skin that was basically added either as a joke or to make up for the amount of skins like HeartSeeker female champs which wasn't that bad, I mean some people probably got a nosebleed but it wasn't anything really other than just Varus looking like cupid.

School Girl Vel'Koz would probably be: Vel'Koz dressed like a normal school girl which would easily fly as a joke skin and people would find it pretty funny but then people that watched (THE WEIRDER SIDE OF THE INTERNET) would get a different interpretation of what the skin really meant and then this could cause some big uproars of complaints. I mean its easy to say Rito wouldn't purposely just release a skin that had a accidental darker intention without thinking about the consequences. What i'm saying is that a lot of people would be pretty disturbed or outright frustrated at the idea of it being in the game including myself since I always found that side of the internet to be considerably gross and Rito hasn't done any genderbender skins yet so thats a good thing.  I know it might seem like a funny skin that was obviously added for comedic reasons and not for dark intentions but from my POV it seems like this becoming a thing will get nothing but backlash.

Well at the very least I want something school-related for Vel'Koz -_- He is *the* learner in league of legends, so maybe we could at least get something like "Senpai Vel'Koz" where he's a student in college.

Also, Headmistress Fiora is quite the fanservice skin (also, seriously, sexy teacher trope). And PO Vi/Cait are... very fanservicey, and sometimes compared to... well I'm not quite agreeing with this, but a few people say they look like... a certain kind of stripper I:

~~PFT, IF WE'RE TALKING STRIPPERS JUST CONSULT CAPTAIN VOLIBEAR~~ Yeah, I see what you mean, I'd love the idea of Senpai Vel too, if only his R would notice me. The idea itself isn't bad at all and it isn't as weird as a School Girl Vel'Koz idea. Also, a school related skin for Vel does really fit him now that I think of the fact he is interested in learning so Senpai Vel'Koz it is.

Oh, and rechecked the splashes just because you mentioned them and I realized the Fiora one and the little things you mentioned in Vi/Cait and they are pretty fanservicey,  now if you'll excuse me i'm going to go wait for my Battle Bunny Rengar
I want a Battle Bunny Ezreal while we're at it.

>
> You do know that if they had a skin like this it could cause..well...player issues? It could imply something a bit too dark for this game, its the same reason Battle Bunny Rengar isn't a thing yet. _**YET**_

In all honesty, the only "dark" thing I can imagine from a skin like "School Girl Vel'koz" is that he somehow murdered a young girl, and took her clothes to better fit into some random school.

http://i.imgur.com/0TaYuMi.jpg
"How is that inappropriate? B-Baka...!"
Schoolgirl Vel'koz. It'd arguably be one of the greatest skins ever.

Ohayou Gozaimasu!

Watashi wa, Vel'Koz desu!
TBH, I would pay infinity money for a Koro-sensei Vel'Koz skin.
